entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 2:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -29.1°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
